entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
